TopicTitle: Text search/filter box for loading craft

Articles.Content:
If we could have an integrated 'word filter' input-line/text-box space on the load craft menu for the VAB/SPH that would be great

Bring up the load menu and (optionally) type in the first letter or part of the craft name you're looking for, and all the other non-matching entries are filtered out of the loadable list
